DOC.brief_summary: PF-06263276 first class inhibitor Janus kinase ( JAK ) enzymes 1 , 2 , 3 tyrosine kinase 2 ( TYK2 ) develop treatment chronic plaque psoriasis . The goal study assess safety , local tolerability , pharmacokinetics healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 Study To Evaluate Tolerability , Safety , And Pharmacokinetics Of Topical PF-06263276 In Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject nonchildbearing potential age 18 55 year , inclusive . Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead ECG clinical laboratory test . Subjects willing able comply schedule visit , treatment plan , laboratory test , study procedure . Subjects willing avoid tanning bed sun exposure back study . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time application ) . Subjects active skin condition application site possibly affect drug absorption ( e.g . rash , sun burn , scar , tattoo ) . Subjects Draize score > 0 test area ( back ) immediately prior first treatment application . Subjects use topical prescription nonprescription drugs/over counter preparation back within 14 day first treatment application . Subjects willing avoid application treatmentssuch lotion cream back throughout study followup .
